snippet.title: Blasphemous 2 Launch Trailer - Future Games Show at Gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Penitent players rejoice! The Game Kitchen cooked up a delicious launch trailer for its pixellated Metroidvania Blasphemous 2, which aired during the Future Games Show at Gamescom. Blasphemous 2 is out on August 24 for PC, PlayStation, Xbox and Nintendo Switch.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS
